classTableGroups.title: Nivells de Ranura per Nivells de Conjur

fluff.name: Paladí
entries: Clad in plate armor that gleams in the sunlight despite the dust and grime of long travel, a human lays down her sword and shield and places her hands on a mortally wounded man. Divine radiance shines from her hands, the man's wounds knit closed, and his eyes open wide with amazement.

A dwarf crouches behind an outcrop, his black cloak making him nearly invisible in the night, and watches an orc war band celebrating its recent victory. Silently, he stalks into their midst and whispers an oath, and two orcs are dead before they even realize he is there.

Silver hair shining in a shaft of light that seems to illuminate only him, an elf laughs with exultation. His spear flashes like his eyes as he jabs again and again at a twisted giant, until at last his light overcomes its hideous darkness.

Whatever their origin and their mission, paladins are united by their oaths to stand against the forces of evil. Whether sworn before a god's altar and the witness of a priest, in a sacred glade before nature spirits and fey beings, or in a moment of desperation and grief with the dead as the only witness, a paladin's oath is a powerful bond. It is a source of power that turns a devout warrior into a blessed champion.

entries.name: The Cause of Righteousness
entries: A paladin swears to uphold justice and righteousness, to stand with the good things of the world against the encroaching darkness, and to hunt the forces of evil wherever they lurk. Different paladins focus on various aspects of the cause of righteousness, but all are bound by the oaths that grant them power to do their sacred work. Although many paladins are devoted to gods of good, a paladin's power comes as much from a commitment to justice itself as it does from a god.

Paladins train for years to learn the skills of combat, mastering a variety of weapons and armor. Even so, their martial skills are secondary to the magical power they wield: power to heal the sick and injured, to smite the wicked and the undead, and to protect the innocent and those who join them in the fight for justice.

entries.name: Beyond the Mundane Life
entries: Almost by definition, the life of a paladin is an adventuring life. Unless a lasting injury has taken him or her away from adventuring for a time, every paladin lives on the front lines of the cosmic struggle against evil. Fighters are rare enough among the ranks of the militias and armies of the world, but even fewer people can claim the true calling of a paladin. When they do receive the call, these warriors turn from their former occupations and take up arms to fight evil. Sometimes their oaths lead them into the service of the crown as leaders of elite groups of knights, but even then their loyalty is first to the cause of righteousness, not to crown and country.

Adventuring paladins take their work seriously. A delve into an ancient ruin or dusty crypt can be a quest driven by a higher purpose than the acquisition of treasure. Evil lurks in dungeons and primeval forests, and even the smallest victory against it can tilt the cosmic balance away from oblivion.

entries.name: Creating a Paladí
entries: The most important aspect of a paladin character is the nature of his or her holy quest. Although the class features related to your oath don't appear until you reach 3rd level, plan ahead for that choice by reading the oath descriptions at the end of the class. Are you a devoted servant of good, loyal to the gods of justice and honor, a holy knight in shining armor venturing forth to smite evil? Are you a glorious champion of the light, cherishing everything beautiful that stands against the shadow, a knight whose oath descends from traditions older than many of the gods? Or are you an embittered loner sworn to take vengeance on those who have done great evil, sent as an angel of death by the gods or driven by your need for revenge? Appendix B lists many deities worshiped by paladins throughout the multiverse, such as Torm, Tyr, Heironeous, Paladine, Kiri-Jolith, Dol Arrah, the Silver Flame, Bahamut, Athena, Re-Horakhty, and Heimdall.

How did you experience your call to serve as a paladin? Did you hear a whisper from an unseen god or angel while you were at prayer? Did another paladin sense the potential within you and decide to train you as a squire? Or did some terrible event—the destruction of your home, perhaps—drive you to your quests? Perhaps you stumbled into a sacred grove or a hidden elven enclave and found yourself called to protect all such refuges of goodness and beauty. Or you might have known from your earliest memories that the paladin's life was your calling, almost as if you had been sent into the world with that purpose stamped on your soul.

As guardians against the forces of wickedness, paladins are rarely of any evil alignment. Most of them walk the paths of charity and justice. Consider how your alignment colors the way you pursue your holy quest and the manner in which you conduct yourself before gods and mortals. Your oath and alignment might be in harmony, or your oath might represent standards of behavior that you have not yet attained.

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a paladin quickly by following these suggestions. First, Força should be your highest ability score, followed by Carisma. Second, choose the {@background noble} background.
The true worth of a paladin is measured not in foes defeated or dungeons plundered. It is measured in lives saved and hearts turned to the causes of mercy and justice.

A paladin is a living embodiment of an oath—a promise or a vow made manifest in the person of a holy warrior who has the skill and the determination to see the cause through to the end. Some paladins devote themselves expressly to protecting the innocent and spreading justice in the world, while others resolve to attain that goal by conquering those who stand defiant and bringing them under the rule of law.

Although no paladin in the world could be described as typical, a number of them are narrow-minded do-gooders who refuse to tolerate even the smallest deviation from their own outlook. Paladins who take up the adventuring life, however, rarely remain so rigid in their attitudes—if only to keep from alienating their companions.

You can flesh out your paladin character by using the suggestions below. It's important to keep in mind that most paladins aren't robots. They have doubts and prejudices and harbor contradictory thoughts just as any other character does. Some are compelled by an internal motivation that might sometimes be at odds with the principles of their oaths.

entries.name: Personal Goal
entries: The precepts of a paladin's oath provide purpose to the character and dictate an ultimate goal or an overall intent that the paladin abides by and advances. Aside from that, some paladins are driven by a personal goal that either complements or transcends the dictates of their oaths. Paladins who swear different oaths might have the same personal goal, differing only in how they apply that goal to their actions when upholding their oaths.
If your paladin character has a personal goal, it might be drawn from some life event and thus not directly tied to the oath.

entries.caption: Personal Goal
rows: Peace. You fight so that future generations will not have to.
Revenge. Your oath is the vehicle through which you will right an ancient wrong.
Duty. You will live up to what you have sworn to do, or die trying.
Leadership. You will win a great battle that bards will sing about, and in so doing, you will become an example to inspire others.
Faith. You know your path is righteous, or else the gods would not have set you upon it.
Glory. You will lead the world into a grand new era, one that will be branded with your name.

entries.name: Symbol
entries: Paladins are mindful of the influence of symbols, and many of them adopt or design an artistic device that bears a distinctive image. Your symbol exemplifies the oath you have taken and communicates that message to those around you, friend and foe alike.
Your symbol might be displayed on a banner, a flag, or your clothing for all to see. Or it could be less obvious, such as a trinket or a token that you carry concealed on your person.

entries.caption: Symbol
rows: A dragon, emblematic of your nobility in peace and your ferocity in combat
A clenched fist, because you are always ready to fight for your beliefs
An upraised open hand, indicating your preference for diplomacy over combat
A red heart, showing the world your commitment to justice
A black heart, signifying that emotions such as pity do not sway your dedication to your oath
An unblinking eye, meaning that you are ever alert to all threats against your cause

entries.name: Nemesis
entries: Their adherence to a sacred oath demands that paladins take an active stance in carrying their beliefs into the world. This activity naturally leads to conflict with creatures or entities that oppose those beliefs. Among those opponents, one often stands out as a paladin's most persistent or most formidable foe—a nemesis whose presence or influence is a constant factor in a paladin's life.

Your paladin character might have an enemy that dates from the days before you took up your path. Or you could be a target because when you became a paladin, you immediately attracted the attention of those that would do you in. If you have a nemesis, who or what is it? Whom among your enemies do you consider to be the biggest threat to achieving your goals?

entries.caption: Nemesis
rows: A mighty orc war chief who threatens to overrun and destroy everything you hold sacred
A diastre or a celestial, the agent of a power of the Outer Planes, who has been charged with corrupting or redeeming you, as appropriate
A dragon whose servants dog your steps
A high priest who sees you as a misguided fool and wants you to abandon your religion
A rival paladin who trained with you but became an oath-breaker and holds you responsible
A vampire who has sworn revenge against all paladins after being defeated by one

entries.name: Temptation
entries: Although paladins are dedicated to their oaths, they are mortals, and thus they are flawed. Many of them exhibit a type of behavior or hold to an attitude that is not in keeping with the highest ideals of their calling.
What is the temptation that your character succumbs to or finds it difficult to resist?

entries.caption: Temptation
rows: Fury. When your anger is roused, you have trouble thinking straight, and you fear you might do something you'll regret.
Pride. Your deeds are noteworthy, and no one takes note of them more often than you.
Lust. You can't resist an attractive face and a pleasant smile.
Envy. You are mindful of what some famous folk have accomplished, and you feel inadequate when your deeds don't compare to theirs.
Despair. You consider the great strength of the enemies you must defeat, and at times you see no way to achieve final victory.
Greed. Regardless of how much glory and treasure you amass, it's never enough for you.

3: protegir del bé i del mal

classFeature.name: Sentit Diví
entries: Sents la presència del mal com si fos una ferum, i la presència del bé és un so de música celestial per a tu. Com a acció, pots obrir els sentits que detecten aquestes forces. Fins el final del teu proper torn, saps la posició de qualsevol celestial, diastre, i no-mort a 60 peus de tu que no estigui darrere de cobertura completa. En conteixes el tipus (celestial, diastre, o no-mort) però no la seva identitat (Comte von Zarovich, per exemple). En aquest radi també detectes els llocs i objectes que hagin estat consagrats o dessecrats, com ara mitjançant el conjur {@spell consagrar}.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com 1 + el teu modificador de Carisma. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, en recuperes tots els usos.

classFeature.name: Imposar Mans
entries: El teu toc beneït pot curar ferides. Tens una reserva de poder que es reomple a cada Descans Llarg. La teva reservaYour blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. La reservar té 5 cops el teu nivell de paladí de punts de vida.
Com a acció, toques una criatura i gastes part de la teva reserva per a curar-la. Pots gastar tants punts de vida de la teva reserva que et quedin com vulguis i donar-los a la criatura.

Alternatively, pots gastar 5 punts de vida de la reserva i curar a l'objectiu d'una malaltia o neutralitzar una metzina que l'afecti. Amb un sol ús d'Imposar Mans pots curar i neutralitzar múltiples malalties i verins, gastant 5 punts per cadascuna.
Aquest tret no afecta a constructes ni a no-morts.

classFeature.name: Càstig Diví
entries: Començant a nivell 2, quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat cos a cos, pots gastar una ranura de conjur per fer dany radiant extra l'objectiu (a part del dany normal de l'arma). Aquest dany és {@dice 2d8} per una ranura de nivell 1, i se li suma {@dice 1d8} per cada nivell de la ranura per sobre d'1; la suma màxima és {@dice 5d8}. També se li afegeix {@dice 1d8} si l'objectiu és un diastre és un diastre o un no-mort.

classFeature.name: Estil de Lluita
entries: A nivell 2, adoptes un estil de lluita particular. Escull una de les opcions següents. Si més endavant pots tornar a escollir un Estil de Lluita, no pots escollir el mateix més d'un cop.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i tret de nivell 2 (millora Estil de Lluita)}

Whenever you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another style available to your class. This change represents a shift of focus in your martial training and practice, causing you to lose the benefits of one style and gain the benefits of another style.

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: A nivell 2, has après a canalitzar màgia divina a través de la meditació i la pregària tal i com ho faria un clergue. El {@book capítol 10|PHB|10} té les normes generals del llançament de conjurs i {@book capítol 11|PHB|11} té la {@filter paladin spell list|spells|class=paladin}.

entries.name: Preparar i Llançar Conjurs
entries: La taula de Paladí mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els {@filter conjurs de paladí|spells|class=paladin}. Per a llançar un conjur de paladí, has de gastar una ranura del nivell del conjur (o superior). Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Per a preparar la llista de conjurs que pots llançar, escull-los de la llista de conjurs de paladí. Esculls tants conjurs de paladí com el teu modificador de Carisma + el teu nivell de paladí (mínim d'1 conjur). Has de tenir una ranura del nivell d'un conjur per a poder preparar-lo.

Així, si ets un paladí de nivell 5, tens quatre ranures de nivell 1 i dues de nivell 2. Si tens 14 de Carisma, et pots preparar fins a 4 conjurs; cadascun pot ser de nivell 1 o bé nivell 2. Si et prepares el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell curar ferides}, el pots llançar gastant una ranura de nivell 1 o bé de nivell 2. Llançar un conjur no te l'elimina de la llista de conjurs preparats; només gasta la ranura.
Pots canviar la llista de conjurs preparats quan acabis un Descans Llarg. Preparar una nova llista de conjurs de druida requereix meditar i pregar com a mínim 1 minut per cada conjur que et preparis.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs de paladin és el Carisma: el teu poder roman en la teva força de voluntat i ideals. Faràs servir el Carisma quan un conjur parli de la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs. També faràs servir el teu modificador de Carisma quan un conjur mencioni: o una CD de salvada; o una tirada d'impactar.

entries.name: Focus de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: Pots emprar un {@item holy symbol|phb} com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus conjurs de paladí.

classFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Aprofitar Poder Diví
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel paladí a nivell 3}

Pots gastar un ús de la teva Canalitzar Divinitat per alimentar els teus conjurs. Com a acció bonus, toques el teu símbol diví, murmures una pregària, i recuperes una ranura de conjur (el nivell pot ser fins la meitat del teu bonus de competència, arrodonint a l'alça). Pots fer servir aquest tret: 1 cop a nivell 3; 2 cops a nivell 7; i 3 cops a nivell 15. En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Aprofitar Poder Diví
entries: {@i tret de paladin a nivell 3 (millora Canalitzar Divinitat)}
Pots gastar un ús de la teva Canalitzar Divinitat to fuel your spells. Com a acció bonus, toques el teu símbol diví, utter a prayer, and regain one expended 1st-level spell slot.

classFeature.name: Salut Divina
entries: A nivell 3, la màgia divina dins teu t'otorga immunitat a les malalties.

classFeature.name: Prometença Sagrada
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 3, fas un jurament que et transforma com a paladí per a sempre. Fins ara t'has estat preparant per seguir aquest camí però encara no has fet el jurement. Escull la teva prometença de la llista següents
La teva elecció t'otorga trets als nivells 3, 7, 15, i 20. Aquests trets són conjurs de prometença i trets de Canalitzar Divinitat.

entries.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Cada prometença té una llista de conjurs associada. Obténs accés a alguns d'aquests conjurs a certs nivells. Un cop accedeixis a un conjur de prometença sempre el tindràs preparat, i no comptarà contra el teu número de conjurs que et pots preparar cada dia.
Si un conjur d'aquesta llista no és un conjur de paladí, el consideres un conjur de paladí.

entries.name: Canalitzar Divinitat
entries: La teva prometença et permet canalitzar energia divina que crea efectes màgics. Cada opció de Canalitzar Divinitat de la teva prometença explica com emprar-la.
Quan empres Canalitzar Divinitat, esculls l'opció que empres. Has d'acabar un Descans Curt o Llarg per poder tornar a emprar Canalitzar Divinitat.
Algunes opcions de Canalitzar Divinitat involucren salvades; la seva CD és la teva CD de salvació conjur de paladí.

entries.name: Breaking Your Oath
entries: A paladin tries to hold to the highest standards of conduct, but even the most virtuous paladin is fallible. Sometimes the right path proves too demanding, sometimes a situation calls for the lesser of two evils, and sometimes the heat of emotion causes a paladin to transgress his or her oath.

A paladin who has broken a vow typically seeks absolution from a cleric who shares his or her faith or from another paladin of the same order. The paladin might spend an all-night vigil in prayer as a sign of penitence, or undertake a fast or similar act of self-denial. After a rite of confession and forgiveness, the paladin starts fresh.

If a paladin willfully violates his or her oath and shows no sign of repentance, the consequences can be more serious. At the DM's discretion, an impenitent paladin might be forced to abandon this class and adopt another, or perhaps to take the Trenca-Prometença paladin option that appears in the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel paladí a nivell 4}

Quan arribes a un nivell amb aquesta classe que et doni el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica feature, you can replace a {@filter Estil de Lluita|optionalfeatures|feature type=FS:P} you know with another Estil de Lluita available to paladins. This replacement represents a shift of focus in your martial practice.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

classFeature.name: Aura de Protecció
entries: Començant a nivell 6, uan tu o un aliat a 10 peus de tu ha de salvar, li suma el teu modificador de Carisma a la salvada (mínim de +1). Només pots donar aquest bonus si estàs conscient.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

classFeature.name: Tret de Prometença Sagrada
entries: A nivell 7, obténs un tret gràcies a la teva Prometença Sagrada.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 8, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 8 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Aura de Coratge
entries: Començant a nivell 10, tu i criatures amistoses a tu a 10 peus no podeu estar {@condition frightened} mentre esteu conscients.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

classFeature.name: Càstig Diví Millorat
entries: A nivell 11, el teu poder diví és tant intens que tots els teus atacs cos a cos tenen energia divina natural. Quan impactes a una criatura amb una arma cos a cos, fas {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant extra.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 12, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 12 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Toc Expurgador
entries: Començant a nivell 14, pots, com a acció, acabar un conjur en tu o una criatura aliada que toquis.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Tret de Prometença Sagrada
entries: A nivell 15, obténs un tret gràcies a la teva Prometença Sagrada.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 16, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 16 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Aures millorades
entries: A nivell 18, l'abast de la teva Aura de Protecció es torna 30 peus.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Tret de Prometença Sagrada
entries: A nivell 20, obténs un tret gràcies a la teva Prometença Sagrada.

subclassFeature.name: Trenca-Prometença
entries: An Trenca-Prometença is a paladin who breaks his or her sacred oaths to pursue some dark ambition or serve an evil power. Whatever light burned in the paladin's heart has been extinguished. Only darkness remains.
A paladin must be evil and at least 3rd level to become an Trenca-Prometença. The paladin replaces the features specific to his or her Sacred Oath with Trenca-Prometença features.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat Trenca-Prometença: Controlar No-morts
entries: Com a acció, el/la/li paladí designa a una criatura no-morta que pugui veure a 30 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, l'objectiu ha d'obeïr les ordres del/la/li paladí durant les properes 24 hores, o fins que torni a emprar aquesta opció de  Canalitzar Divinitat. Un no-mort és immune a aquesta opció si té un Valor de Repte equivalent o major al del nivell del/la/li paladí.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat Trenca-Prometença: Aspecte Terrorífic
entries: Com a acció, el/la/li paladí accepta les seves emocions més fosques i les fa esclatar en energia màgica. Tota criatura que desigini el/la/li paladí a 30 peus seus ha de salvar per Saviesa si pot veure'l. Si falla, l'objectiu esdevé {@condition frightened} del/la/li paladí durant 1 minut. Si una criatura {@condition frightened} així acaba el seu torn a més de 30 peus del/la/li paladí, pot repetir la salvada.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de Trenca-Prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de trenca-prometença als nivells llistats.

subclassFeature.name: Aura d'Odi
entries: Començant a nivell 7, el/la/li paladí i tot diastre i no-mort a 10 peus del/la/li paladí pot afegir la puntuació de Carisma del/la/li paladí a les tirades d'impactar amb armes cos a cos (mínim de +1). Una criatura només pot rebre un d'aquests beneficis alhora.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Resistència Sobrenatural
entries: A nivell 15, el/la/li paladí obté resistència al  dany contundent, tallant, i perforant d'armes no-màgiques.

subclassFeature.name: Senyor del Temor
entries: A nivell 20, com a acció, el/la/li paladí es pot embolcallar en una aura de negativitat durant 1 minut, que redueix la llum forta a llum tènue en un radi de 30 peus. Quan un enemic {@condition frightened} pel/la/li paladí comenci el torn a l'aura, rep {@damage 4d10} de dany psíquic. A més, el/la/li paladí i les criatures que designi que estiguin a dins de l'aura els embolcalla més ombra. Així, les criatures que depenguin en la vista per impactar ho fan a desavantatge.

Mentre duri l'aura el/la/li paladí pot, com a acció bonus, fer que les ombres ataquin a una criatura. El/la/li paladí fa un atac màgic cos a cos contra l'objectiu. Si impacta, L'objectiu rep {@dice 3d10} + the paladin's Carisma modifier de dany necròtic.
Un cop activi l'aura, el/la/li paladí no hi pot tornar fins que acabi un descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Prometença dels Ancians
entries: The Prometença dels Ancians is as old as the race of elves and the rituals of the druids. Sometimes called fey knights, green knights, or horned knights, paladins who swear this oath cast their lot with the side of the light in the cosmic struggle against darkness because they love the beautiful and life-giving things of the world, not necessarily because they believe in principles of honor, courage, and justice. They adorn their armor and clothing with images of growing things—leaves, antlers, or flowers—to reflect their commitment to preserving life and light in the world.

entries.subclassFeature: Canalitzar Divinitat: Ira de la Natura|Paladí||Ancians||3
Canalitzar Divinitat: Convertir a la Fe|Paladí||Ancians||3

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Ira de la Natura
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat perquè les energies primordials atrapin a un anemic. Com a acció, generes lianes espectrals a 10 peus d'una criatura que puguis veure. La criatura ha de salvar per Força or Destresa (escull ella). Si falla, està {@condition restrained}. {@condition restrained} així, pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu. Si supera, s'allibera i les lianes s'esvaneixes.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Convertir a la Fe
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat i murmurar paraules antigues que fereixen a les fates i als diastres. Com a acció, presentes el teu símbol sagrat i tota fata i infernel a 30 peus de tu que et pugui sentir ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, la criatura està expulsada durant 1 minut o fins que rebi dany.

Expulsada així, una criatura ha de gastar els seus torns provant d'allunyar-se de tu tan com puguin; no poden acostar-se a 30 peus de tu o menys voluntàriament. Tampoc pot prendre reaccions. Com a acció només pot {@action Córrer} o provar d'escapar d'un efecte que l'impedeixi moure's. Si no pot moure's enlloc, la criatura prèn l'acció {@action Esquivar}.
Si la criatura oculta la seva forma veritable amb una il·lusió, canvi de forma, o altre efecte, aquesta es revela mentre està expulsada.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

entries.caption: Prometença dels Ancians Spells
rows: {@spell creixement de la flora}, {@spell protegir de l'energia}
{@spell tempesta de gel}, {@spell pell de pedra}
{@spell comunió amb la natura}, {@spell passeig pels arbres}

subclassFeature.name: Manaments dels Ancians
entries: Els manaments de la Prometença dels Ancians s'han preservat durant segles. This oath emphasizes the principles of good above any concerns of law or chaos. Its four central principles are simple.

entries.name: Kindle the Light
entries: Through your acts of mercy, kindness, and forgiveness, kindle the light of hope in the world, beating back despair.

entries.name: Shelter the Light
entries: Where there is good, beauty, love, and laughter in the world, stand against the wickedness that would swallow it. Where life flourishes, stand against the forces that would render it barren.

entries.name: Preserve Your Own Light
entries: Delight in song and laughter, in beauty and art. If you allow the light to die in your own heart, you can't preserve it in the world.

entries.name: Be the Light
entries: Be a glorious beacon for all who live in despair. Let the light of your joy and courage shine forth in all your deeds.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de Guarda
entries: Començant a nivell 7, la màgia anciana és tan forta en tu que t'otorga una guarda èldritx. Tu i criatures amistoses a tu a 10 peus de tu teniu reistència al dany de conjurs.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Sentinella Immortal
entries: Començant a nivell 15, quan et quedes a 0 punts de vida però no mors immediatament, pots quedar-te a 1 punt de vida i no a 0. No pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.
A més, no pateixes els problemes d'envellir, ni se't pot envellir màgicament.

subclassFeature.name: Campió Èldritx
entries: A nivell 20, pots assumir la forma d'una força primordial de la natura amb l'aparença que vulguis. Per exemple, la teva pell es pot tornar verda o com si fos escorça; el teu cabell pot semblar fulles o molsa; o et poden sortir astes o una melena de lleó.
Com a acció, et transformes. Durant 1 minut, reps els beneficis següents:

items: A l'inici de cada torn teu, recuperes 10 punts de vida.
Quan llances un conjur de paladí amb duració de llançament d'1 acció, el pots llançar com a acció bonus.
Les criatures enemigues a 10 peus de tu salven amb desavantatge contra els teus conjurs de paladí i la teva Canalitzar Divinitat.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Prometença de Devoció
entries: The Prometença de Devoció binds a paladin to the loftiest ideals of justice, virtue, and order. Sometimes called cavaliers, white knights, or holy warriors, these paladins meet the ideal of the knight in shining armor, acting with honor in pursuit of justice and the greater good. They hold themselves to the highest standards of conduct, and some, for better or worse, hold the rest of the world to the same standards. Many who swear this oath are devoted to gods of law and good and use their gods' tenets as the measure of their Devoció. They hold angels—the perfect servants of good—as their ideals, and incorporate images of angelic wings into their helmets or coats of arms.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Arma Sagrada
entries: Com a acció, pots infondre energia positiva a una arma que empunyis mitjançant el Canalitzar Divinitat. Durant 1 minut, afegeixes el teu modificador de Carisma al dany de l'arma (mínim de +1). L'arma brilla llum forta en un radi de 20 peus i llum tènue uns 20 peus més enllà. Esdevé màgica mentre duri la Canalització.
Pots acabar aquest efecte en el teu torn com a part d'una altre acció qualsevol. També acaba si deixes d'empunyar l'arma o si et quedes {@condition unconscious}.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Expulsar Profanació
entries: Com a acció, presentes el teu símbol sagrat i dius una pregària que censura a diastres i a no-morts censuring mitjançant el teu Canalitzar Divinitat. Tot diastre o no-mort que et pugui veure o sentir a 30 peus de tu ha de salvar per Saviesa. Qui falli queda expulsat durant 1 minut o fins que rebi dany.

Una criatura expulsada ha d'emprar els seus torns allunyant-se de tu tan com pugui, i no es pot acostar a menys de 30 peus de tu voluntàriament. Tampoc pot prendre reaccions. Com a acció només pot {@action Córrer} o provar d'escapar d'un efecte que l'impedeixi moure's. Si no pot moure's enlloc, la criatura prèn l'acció {@action Esquivar}.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

entries.caption: Prometença de Devoció Spells
rows: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}, {@spell santuari}
{@spell restabliment menor}, {@spell zona de la veritat}
{@spell llibertat de moviments}, {@spell guardià de fe}

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Devoció
entries: Though the exact words and strictures of the Prometença de Devoció vary, paladins of this oath share these tenets.

entries.name: Honesty
entries: Don't lie or cheat. Let your word be your promise.

entries.name: Courage
entries: Never fear to act, though caution is wise.

entries.name: Compassion
entries: Aid others, protect the weak, and punish those who threaten them. Show mercy to your foes, but temper it with wisdom.

entries.name: Honor
entries: Treat others with fairness, and let your honorable deeds be an example to them. Do as much good as possible while causing the least amount of harm.

entries.name: Duty
entries: Be responsible for your actions and their consequences, protect those entrusted to your care, and obey those who have just authority over you.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de Devoció
entries: Començant a nivell 7, tu i criatures amistoses a tu a 10 peus de tu no podeu estar {@condition charmed} mentre estiguis conscient.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Puresa d'Esperit
entries: Començant a nivell 15, estàs constantment sota els efectes del conjur {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}.

subclassFeature.name: Nimbus Sagrat
entries: A nivell 20, com a acció, emanes una aura de llum solar. Durant 1 minut, emanes llum forta en un radi de 30 peus, i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.
Quan una criatura enemiga comença el seu torn dins la teva llum forta, rep 10 de dany radiant.
A més, durant la duració, tens avantatge a salvar contra conjurs llançats per diastres o no-morts.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Prometença de Venjança
entries: The Prometença de Venjança is a solemn commitment to punish those who have committed a grievous sin. When evil forces slaughter helpless villagers, when an entire people turns against the will of the gods, when a thieves' guild grows too violent and powerful, when a dragon rampages through the countryside - at times like these, paladins arise and swear an Prometença de Venjança to set right that which has gone wrong. To these paladins—sometimes called avengers or dark knights—their own purity is not as important as delivering justice.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Abjurar Enemic
entries: Com a acció, presentes el teu símbol sagrat i dius una pregària de denúnica mitjançant el teu Canalitzar Divinitat. Escull una criatura a 60 peus de tu que puguis veure. Ha de salvar per Saviesa, excepte si és immune a estar {@condition frightened}. Diastres i no-morts salven amb desavantatge.
Si falla, la criatura està {@condition frightened} per tu durant 1 minut o fins que rebi dany. {@condition frightened} així la seva velocitat és 0 i no pot beneficiar-se de cap bonus a la velocitat.
Si supera la velocitat es redueix a la meitat durant 1 minut o fins que rebi dany.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Vot d'Enemistat
entries: Com a acció bonus, pots murmurar un vot d'enemistat contra una criatura que puguis veure a 10 peus de tu mitjançant el teu Canalitzar Divinitat. L'impactes amb avantatge durant 1 minut o fins que es quedi a 0 punts de vida o es quedi {@condition unconscious}.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Venjança
entries: The tenets of the Prometença de Venjança vary by paladin, but all the tenets revolve around punishing wrongdoers by any means necessary. Paladins who uphold these tenets are willing to sacrifice even their own righteousness to mete out justice upon those who do evil, so the paladins are often neutral or lawful neutral in alignment. The core principles of the tenets are brutally simple.

entries.name: Fight the Greater Evil
entries: Faced with a choice of fighting my sworn foes or combating a lesser evil, I choose the greater evil.

entries.name: No Mercy for the Wicked
entries: Ordinary foes might win my mercy, but my sworn enemies do not.

entries.name: By Any Means Necessary
entries: My qualms can't get in the way of exterminating my foes.

entries.name: Restitution
entries: If my foes wreak ruin on the world, it is because I failed to stop them. I must help those harmed by their misdeeds.

subclassFeature.name: Venjança Imbatible
entries: A nivell 7, la teva concentració sobrenatural t'ajuda a impedir l'escapada a un enemic. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac d'oportunitat, pots, com a part de la mateixa reacció, moure't fins la meitat de la teva velocitat. Aquest moviment no provoca atacs d'oportunitat.

subclassFeature.name: Ànima de Venjança
entries: Començant a nivell 15, l'autoritat del teu Vot d'Enemistat et dona més poder sobre el teu enemic. Una criatura afectada pel teu Vot d'Enemistat fa un atac pots, com a reacció, fer un atac armat cos a cos contra aquella criatura si la tens a l'abast.

subclassFeature.name: Àngel de Retribució
entries: A nivell 20, pots tornar-te un angel de venjança. Com a acció, et transformes físicament. Durant 1 hora, reps els beneficis següents:

items: Et surten ales que et donen una velocitat de vol de 60 peus.

Emanes una aura amenaçadora en un radi de 30 peus. Quan una criatura hi entra per primer cop o hi coomença el seu torn ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, està {@condition frightened} de tu durant 1 minut o fins que rebi dany. Tirades d'impacte contra la criatura {@condition frightened} tenen avantatge.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Prometença de la Corona
entries: The Prometença de la Corona is sworn to the ideals of civilization, be it the spirit of a nation, fealty to a sovereign, or service to a deity of law and rulership. The paladins who swear this oath dedicate themselves to serving society and, in particular, the laws that hold society together. These paladins are the watchful guardians on the walls, standing against the chaotic tides of barbarism that threaten to tear down all that civilization has built, and are commonly known as guardians, exemplars, or sentinels. Often, paladins who swear this oath are members of an order of knighthood in service to a nation or sovereign, and undergo their oath as part of their admission to the order's ranks.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Repte de Campions
entries: Com a acció bonus, publiques un repte que obliga que altres criatures lluitin amb tu. Tota criatura que designis que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu ha de salvar per Saviesa. Qui falli no pot anar més lluny de 30 peus de tu. Aquest efecte se li acaba si et quedes {@condition incapacitated} o si mors or si la criatura s'allunya més de 30 peus de tu.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Capgirar la batalla
entries: Com a acció bonus, pots invigorar criatures malferides mitjançant el teu Canalitzar Divinitat. Tota criatura que designis que et pugui sentir a 30 peus de tu que no té més de la meitat dels seus punts de vida recupera {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'1) de punts de vida.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

entries.caption: Prometença de la Corona Spells
rows: {@spell vincle de guarda}, {@spell zona de la veritat}

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of the Corona
entries: The tenets of the Prometença de la Corona are often set by the sovereign to which their oath is sworn, but generally emphasize the following tenets.

entries.name: Law
entries: The law is paramount. It is the mortar that holds the stones of civilization together, and it must be respected.

entries.name: Loyalty
entries: Your word is your bond. Without loyalty, oaths and laws are meaningless.

entries.name: Courage
entries: You must be willing to do what needs to be done for the sake of order, even in the face of overwhelming odds. If you don't act, then who will?

entries.name: Responsibility
entries: You must deal with the consequences of your actions, and you are responsible for fulfilling your duties and obligations.

subclassFeature.name: Aliança Divina
entries: Començant a nivell 7, quan una criatura a 5 peus de tu rebi dany pots, com a reacció, substituir la teva salut màgicament amb la de la criatura; així, la criatura no rep el dany, sino tu. No pots reduir-te ni prevenir aquest dany de cap manera.

subclassFeature.name: Esperit Incessant
entries: Començant a nivell 15, tens avantatge a salvar contra quedar-te {@condition paralyzed} o {@condition stunned}.

subclassFeature.name: Exaltar Campions
entries: A nivell 20, la teva presència al camp de batalla inspira a qui admiren la teva causa. Pots, com a acció, rebre els següents beneficis durant 1 hora:

items: Tens resistència al dany contundent, perforant, i tallant d'armes no-màgiques.
El teus aliats tenen avantatge a les salvades de mort si estan a 30 peus de tu.
Tens avantatge en salvades de Saviesa, i també el teus aliats a 30 peus de tu.

entries: L'efecte acaba prematurament si et quedes {@condition incapacitated} o si mors. Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Glory
entries: Paladins who take the Oath of Glory believe they and their companions are destined to achieve glory through deeds of heroism. They train diligently and encourage their companions so they're all ready when destiny calls.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Glory a nivell 3}
You gain the following two Canalitzar Divinitat options. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how Canalitzar Divinitat works.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Glory a nivell 3}
Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats in the Oath of Glory Spells table. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how conjurs de prometença work.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Glory
entries: The tenets of the Oath of Glory drive a paladin to attempt heroics that might one day shine in legend.

entries.name: Actions over Words
entries: Strive to be known by glorious deeds, not words.

entries.name: Challenges Are but Tests
entries: Face hardships with courage, and encourage your allies to face them with you.

entries.name: Hone the Body
entries: Like raw stone, your body must be worked so its potential can be realized.

entries.name: Discipline the Soul
entries: You must marshal the discipline to overcome failings within yourself that threaten to dim the glory of you and your friends.

subclassFeature.name: Inspiring Smite
entries: Immediatament after you deal damage to a creature with your Càstig Diví feature, pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat com a acció bonus and distribute punts de vida temporals to creatures (escull) a 30 peus de tu, which can include you. The total number of punts de vida temporals equals {@dice 2d8} + your level en aquesta classe, divided among les criatures designades however you like.

subclassFeature.name: Peerless Athlete
entries: Com a acció bonus, pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to augment your athleticism. For the next 10 minutes, tens avantatge a Força ({@skill Athletics}) and Destresa ({@skill Acrobatics}); you can carry, push, drag, and lift twice as much weight as normal; and the distance of your long and high jumps increases by 10 feet (this extra distance costs movement as normal).

subclassFeature.name: Aura de Alacrity
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Glory a nivell 7}

You emanate an aura that fills you and your companions with supernatural speed, allowing you to race across a battlefield in formation. La teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 10 peus. A més, if you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, the walking speed of any ally who starts their turn a 5 peus de tu increases by 10 feet until the end of that turn.
Quan arribes a nivell 18 en aquesta classe, the range of the aura increases to 10 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Glorious Defense
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Glory a nivell 15}

You can turn defense into a sudden strike. When you or another creature que puguis veure a 10 peus de tu is hit by an attack roll, pots, com a reacció, grant a bonus to the target's AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. The bonus equals el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim de +1). If the attack misses, you can make one weapon attack against the attacker as part of this reaction, provided the attacker is within your weapon's range.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Living Legend
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Glory a nivell 20}
You can empower yourself with the legends—whether true or exaggerated—of your great deeds. Com a acció bonus, reps els beneficis següents durant 1 minut:

items: You are blessed with an otherworldly presence, gaining advantage on all Carisma checks.
Un cop a cada torn teu when you make a weapon attack and miss, you can cause that attack a impactar instead.
If you fail a saving throw, pots, com a reacció, reroll it. You must use this new roll.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis un 5th-level spell slot to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of the Watchers
entries: The Oath of the Watchers binds paladins to protect mortal realms from the predations of extraplanar creatures, many of which can lay waste to mortal soldiers. Thus, the Watchers hone their minds, spirits, and bodies to be the ultimate weapons against such threats.

Paladins who follow the Watchers' oath are ever vigilant in spotting the influence of extraplanar forces, often establishing a network of spies and informants to gather information on suspected cults. To a Watcher, keeping a healthy suspicion and awareness about one's surroundings is as natural as wearing armor in battle.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 3}
You gain the following Canalitzar Divinitat options. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how Canalitzar Divinitat works.

entries.name: Watcher's Will
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to invest your presence with the warding power of your faith. Com a acció, you can choose a number of creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, up to a number equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'una). Durant 1 minut, you and les criatures designades have advantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws.

entries.name: Abjure the Extraplanar
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to castigate unworldly beings. Com a acció, presentes el teu símbol sagrat i each aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, or diastre a 30 peus de tu que et pugui sentir ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, the creature is turned durant 1 minut or until it takes damage.

Una criatura expulsada ha d'emprar els seus torns allunyant-se de tu tan com pugui, and it can't willingly end its move in a space a 30 peus de tu. Com a acció només pot {@action Córrer} o provar d'escapar d'un efecte que l'impedeixi moure's. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can take l'acció {@action Esquivar}.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 3}
Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats in the Oath of the Watchers table. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how conjurs de prometença work.

entries.caption: Oath of the Watchers Spells  Spells

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of the Watchers
entries: A paladin who assumes the Oath of the Watchers swears to safeguard mortal realms from otherworldly threats.

entries.name: Vigilance
entries: The threats you face are cunning, powerful, and subversive. Be ever alert for their corruption.

entries.name: Loyalty
entries: Never accept gifts or favors from diastres or those who truck with them. Stay true to your order, your comrades, and your duty.

entries.name: Discipline
entries: You are the shield against the endless terrors that lie beyond the stars. Your blade must be forever sharp and your mind keen to survive what lies beyond.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de the Sentinel
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 7}

You emit an aura de alertness while you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. When you and any creatures (escull) a 10 peus de tu roll initiative, you all gain a bonus to initiative equal to el teu bonus de competència.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Vigilant Rebuke
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 15}

You've learned how to chastise anyone who dares wield beguilements against you and your wards. Whenever you or a creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu succeeds on an Intel·ligència, a Saviesa, or a Carisma saving throw, pots, com a reacció, deal {@damage 2d8} + el teu modificador de Carisma force damage to the creature that forced the saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Mortal Bulwark
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 20}
You manifest a spark of divine power in defense of the mortal realms. Com a acció bonus, reps els beneficis següents durant 1 minut:

items: You gain {@sense truesight} amb un abast de 120 peus.
Tens avantatge a attack rolls against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and diastres.

Quan impactes a una criatura and deal damage to it, you can also force it to make a Carisma saving throw contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla, the creature is magically banished to its native plane of existence if it's currently not there. On a successful save, the creature can't be banished by this feature durant 24 hores.

entries: Once you use this bonus action, you can't use it again fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis un 5th-level spell slot to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of the Watchers
entries: Paladins who vow the Oath of the Watchers seek to protect the mortal realm from the predations of extraplanar creatures, many of which can lay waste to mortal soldiers. Thus, the Watchers hone their minds, spirits, and bodies to be the ultimate weapons against such threats.

Paladins who follow the Watchers' oath are ever vigilant in spotting the influence of extraplanar forces, often establishing a network of spies and informants to gather information on suspected cults. To a Watcher, keeping a healthy suspicion and awareness about one's surroundings is as natural as wearing armor in battle.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 3}
You gain the following Canalitzar Divinitat options. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how Canalitzar Divinitat works.

entries.name: Watcher's Will
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to invest your presence with the warding power of your faith. Com a acció, you can choose a number of creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, up to a number equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'una). Durant 1 minut, all les criatures designades have advantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws.

entries.name: Abjure the Extraplanar
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to castigate unworldly beings. Com a acció, presentes el teu símbol sagrat i each elemental, fey, fiend, or aberration a 30 peus de tu que et pugui sentir ha de salvar per Saviesa. Si falla, the creature is turned durant 1 minut or until it takes damage.

Una criatura expulsada ha d'emprar els seus torns allunyant-se de tu tan com pugui, i no es pot acostar a menys de 30 peus de tu voluntàriament. Com a acció només pot {@action Córrer} o provar d'escapar d'un efecte que l'impedeixi moure's. Si no pot moure's enlloc, la criatura prèn l'acció {@action Esquivar}.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 3}
Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats in the Oath of the Watchers table. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how conjurs de prometença work.

entries.caption: Oath of the Watchers Spells  Spells

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of the Watchers
entries: A paladin who assumes the Oath of the Watchers swears to safeguard the mortal realm from otherworldly threats.

entries.name: Vigilance
entries: The threats you face are cunning, powerful, and subversive. Be ever alert for their corruption.

entries.name: Loyalty
entries: Never accept gifts or favors from diastres or those who truck with them. Stay true to your order, your comrades, and your duty.

entries.name: Discipline
entries: You are the shield against the endless terrors that lie beyond the stars. Your blade must be forever sharp and your mind keen to survive what lies beyond.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de the Sentinel
entries: {@i 7th- and tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 18}

You emit an aura de alertness while you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. When you and any creature (escull) a 10 peus de tu rolls initiative, you each gain a bonus to initiative equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim de +1). A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Vigilant Rebuke
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 15}

You've learned how to magically chastise anyone who dares cast unwanted spells at you and your wards. Whenever you or a creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu succeeds on a saving throw against a spell, pots, com a reacció, deal {@damage 2d8} + el teu modificador de Carisma force damage to the spellcaster.

subclassFeature.name: Mortal Bulwark
entries: {@i tret de Oath of the Watchers a nivell 20}
You manifest a spark of your deity's power in defense of your sacred oath. Com a acció bonus, reps els beneficis següents durant 1 minut:

items: You gain {@sense truesight} in a 120-foot radius.
Tens avantatge a attack rolls against elementals, fey, diastres, and aberrations.

Quan impactes a una criatura with an attack and deal damage to it, you can also force it to make a Carisma saving throw. Si falla, the creature is magically banished to its native plane of existence if it's currently not there. On a successful save, the creature can't be banished by this feature durant 24 hores.

entries: Once you use this bonus action, you can't use it again fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Redemption
entries: The Oath of Redemption sets a paladin on a difficult path, one that requires a holy warrior to use violence only as a last resort. Paladins who dedicate themselves to this oath believe that any person can be redeemed and that the path of benevolence and justice is one that anyone can walk. These paladins face evil creatures in the hope of turning them to the light, and the paladins slay them only when such a deed will clearly save other lives. Paladins who follow this path are known as redeemers.

While redeemers are idealists, they are no fools. Redeemers know that undead, demons, devils, and other supernatural threats can be inherently evil. Against such foes, the paladins bring the full wrath of their weapons and spells to bear. Yet the redeemers still pray that, one day, even creatures of wickedness will invite their own redemption.

subclassFeature.name: Armor of Peace
entries: Començant a nivell 3, your commitment to peace allows you to walk into the most dangerous situations unarmored. While you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield, your base AC is 16 + el teu modificador de Destresa.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Emissary of Peace
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to augment your presence with divine power. Com a acció bonus, you grant yourself a +5 bonus to the next Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) you make within the next minute.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Rebuke the Violent
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to rebuke those who use violence. Com a reacció when an enemy a 10 peus de tu deals damage amb un atac cos a cos against one creature other than you, you force that attacker to make a Saviesa saving throw. Si falla, the attacker takes radiant damage equal to the damage it just dealt. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

entries.caption: Oath of Redemption Spells
rows: {@spell Esfera resistent de l'Otiluk}, {@spell pell de pedra}

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Redemption
entries: The tenets of the Oath of Redemption hold a paladin to a high standard of peace and justice.

entries.name: Peace
entries: Violence is a weapon of last resort. Diplomacy and understanding are the paths to long-lasting peace.

entries.name: Innocence
entries: All people begin life in an innocent state, and it is their environment or the influence of dark forces that drives them to evil. By setting the proper example, and working to heal the wounds of a deeply flawed world, you can set anyone on a righteous path.

entries.name: Patience
entries: Change takes time. Those who have walked the path of the wicked must be given reminders to keep them honest and true. Once you have planted the seed of righteousness in a creature, you must work day after day to allow it to survive and then flourish.

entries.name: Saviesa
entries: Your heart and mind must stay clear, for eventually you will be forced to admit defeat. While every creature can be redeemed, some are so far along the path of evil that you have no choice but to end their lives for the greater good. Any such action must be carefully weighed and the consequences fully understood, but once you have made the decision, follow through with it knowing your path is just.

subclassFeature.name: Warrior of Reconciliation
entries: A nivell 3, you foreswear the weapons of war in favor of simple tools. While wielding a simple weapon that deals dany contundent, you gain a special benefit if you reduce a creature to 0 punts de vida with that weapon and decide to spare the creature's life. Instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, the creature is {@condition charmed} per tu durant 1 minut. During that time, the {@condition charmed} creature is peaceful and docile, refusing to move or to take actions or reactions, unless you command it to. You can't order the creature to attack, force someone to make a saving throw, or cause damage to itself or others. This {@condition charmed} effect ends early si et quedes {@condition incapacitated} or if you or your companions attack the creature, deal damage to it, or force it to make a saving throw. When the effect ends, the creature falls {@condition unconscious} if it still has 0 punts de vida.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de the Guardian
entries: Començant a nivell 7, you can shield your allies from harm at the cost of your own health. Com a reacció when an ally a 10 peus de tu takes damage, you instead magically take that damage. This feature doesn't transfer any other effects that might accompany the damage.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Spirit
entries: Començant a nivell 15, a holy presence mends your wounds in combat. You regain punts de vida equal to {@dice 1d6} + la meitat del teu nivell de paladí if you end your turn in combat with fewer than half of your punts de vida remaining and you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

subclassFeature.name: Emissary of Redemption
entries: A nivell 20, you become an avatar of peace, which gives you two benefits:

items: Tens resistència a tot tipus de dany dealt by other creatures (their attacks, spells, and other effects).
Whenever a creature damages you, it takes damage equal to half the amount it dealt to you.

entries: If you attack a creature, deal damage to it, or force it to make a saving throw, neither benefit works contra aquella criatura fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Heroism
entries: The Oath of Heroism is an affirmation of a destined path, one laid out for you by divine hands. For whatever reason, a god or a group of gods has included you in their machinations. You are not a reluctant hero, but one who fully embraces the idea that great deeds are yours to achieve. You train diligently, sculpting your body and refining your skills so you're ready when destiny calls.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Heroism a nivell 3}
You gain the following two Canalitzar Divinitat options.

entries.name: Peerless Athlete
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to augment your athleticism with divine favor. Com a acció bonus, you gain advantage on all Força ({@skill Athletics}) and Destresa ({@skill Acrobatics}) for the next 10 minutes.

entries.name: Legendary Strike
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat com a acció bonus to guide your attacks: durant 1 minut, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Heroism a nivell 3}
Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats in the Oath of Heroism Spells table.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Heroism
entries: The tenets of the Oath of Heroism reflect a paladin's commitment to fulfilling their calling as a hero worthy of legend.

entries.name: Actions over Words
entries: Strive to be known by deeds not words.

entries.name: Challenges Are but Tests
entries: Every hardship serves to challenge your abilities and harden your resolve.

entries.name: Embrace Destiny
entries: You didn't choose this path, but it's yours to walk. And it will carry you into legend.

entries.name: Hone the Body
entries: Like raw stone, your body must be worked so its potential can be realized.

subclassFeature.name: Mighty Deed
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Heroism a nivell 7}

Your actions on the battlefield can supernaturally bolster your allies and demoralize your enemies. Whenever you score a critical hit or reduce a creature to 0 punts de vida, you can choose one or more creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, up to a number equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'una). All les criatures designades are affected by one of the following effects (escull):

items: The creature gains punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'1 punt de vida temporal).
La criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa. contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or està {@condition frightened} de tu fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

entries: Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Glorious Defense
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Heroism a nivell 15}

Your blessed glory on the battlefield can misdirect an attack. Quan una criatura que puguis veure t'impacta amb un atac, pots, com a reacció, gain a bonus to AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss you. The bonus equals el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim de +1). If the attack misses, you can make one weapon attack against the attacker as part of this reaction.

subclassFeature.name: Living Myth
entries: {@i tret de Oath of Heroism a nivell 20}
You can now empower yourself with the legends—whether true or exaggerated—told of your great deeds. Com a acció bonus, reps els beneficis següents durant 10 minuts:

items: You are blessed with otherworldly comeliness, gaining advantage on all Carisma checks.
Un cop a cada torn teu when you make a weapon attack and miss, you can cause that attack a impactar instead.
If you fail a saving throw, pots, com a reacció, succeed instead.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Conquest
entries: The Oath of Conquest calls to paladins who seek glory in battle and the subjugation of their enemies. It isn't enough for these paladins to establish order. They must crush the forces of chaos. Sometimes called knight tyrants or iron mongers, those who swear this oath gather into grim orders that serve gods or philosophies of war and well-ordered might. Some of these paladins go so far as to consort with the powers of the Nine Hells. The archdevil Bel, warlord of Avernus, counts many of these paladins called hell knights as his most ardent supporters. Hell knights cover their armor with trophies taken from fallen enemies, a grim warning to any who dare oppose them and the decrees of their lords.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Conquering Strike
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to break a foe's will. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat cos a cos com a part de l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can also use your Canalitzar Divinitat to force the target to make a Saviesa saving throw. Si falla, the target becomes {@condition frightened} de tu durant 1 minut. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat this saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Guided Strike
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to strike with supernatural accuracy. When you make an attack roll, pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to gain a +10 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Conquest
entries: A paladin who takes this oath has the tenets of conquest seared on the upper arm. A hell knight's oath appears in {@language diàstric} runes, a brutal reminder of vows to the Lords of Hell.

entries.name: Douse the Flame of Hope
entries: It is not enough to merely defeat an enemy in battle. Your victory must be so overwhelming that your enemies will to fight is shattered forever. A blade can end a life. Fear can end an empire.

entries.name: Rule with an Iron Fist
entries: Once you have conquered, tolerate no dissent. Your word is law. Those who obey it shall be favored. Those who defy it shall be punished as an example to all who might follow.

entries.name: Força Above All
entries: You shall rule until a stronger one arises. Then you must grow mightier and meet the challenge, or fall to your own ruin.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de Conquest
entries: Començant a nivell 7, you emanate a menacing aura while you're not {@condition incapacitated}. The aura includes your space, extends 10 feet from you in every direction, and is blocked by total cover. Any enemy in the aura has disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.
A nivell 18, l'abast d'aquesta aura es torna 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable Spirit
entries: Once you reach 15th level, you can no longer be {@condition charmed}.

subclassFeature.name: Invincible Conqueror
entries: A nivell 20, you gain the ability to harness extraordinary martial prowess. Com a acció, you can magically become an avatar of conquest, gaining the following benefits durant 1 minut:

items: Tens resistència a tot tipus de dany.
Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn, you can make one additional attack as part of that action.
Your atac armat cos a coss score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Treachery
entries: The Oath of Treachery is the path followed by paladins who have forsworn other oaths or who care only for their own power and survival. Commonly known as blackguards, these profane warriors are faithful only to themselves. Anyone desperate enough to follow one of these paladins does so because, while deceitful, these paladins command great power. Aquella gent que segueixm without falling prey to their treachery hope to indulge in wanton violence and accumulate great treasure. Many of these paladins pay homage to demon lords, especially Grazz't and Orcus. Even the Lords of Hell are loath to ally with these champions of chaos, but sometimes Baalzebul and Glasya find a kindred spirit in a blackguard's penchant for double dealing and treachery.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Conjure Duplicate
entries: Com a acció, you create a visual illusion of yourself that dura 1 minut, or until you lose your concentration (com si et concentressis en un conjur). The illusion appears en un espai desocupat (escull) que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The illusion looks exactly like you; it is silent; it is your size, is insubstantial, doesn't occupy its space; and it is unaffected by attacks and damage. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can move the illusion fins a 30 peus to a space que puguis veure, but the illusion must remain a 120 peus de tu.

For the duration, you can cast spells as though you were in the illusion's space, but you must use your own senses. A més, when both you and your illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, tens avantatge a attack rolls contra aquella criatura, given how uncanny the illusion is.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Poison Strike
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to make a weapon deadlier. Com a acció bonus, you touch one weapon or piece of ammunition and conjure a special poison on it. The poison dura 1 minut. The next time you hit a target with an attack using that weapon or ammunition, L'objectiu rep poison damage immediately after the attack. The poison damage equals {@dice 2d10} + el teu nivell de paladí, or 20 + el teu nivell de paladí if you had advantage on the attack roll.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Treachery
entries: A paladin who embraces the Oath of Treachery owes allegiance to no one. There are no tenets of this oath, for it lacks any substance. Those who are unfortunate enough to have close contact with blackguards have observed that a blackguard's overwhelming concern is power and safety, especially if both can be obtained at the expense of others.

subclassFeature.name: Aura de Treachery
entries: Començant a nivell 7, you emanate an aura de discord, which gives you the following benefits.

entries.name: Cull the Herd
entries: Tens avantatge a atac cos a cos rolls against any creature that has one or more of its allies within 5 feet of it.

entries.name: Treacherous Strike
entries: Si una criatura a 5 peus de tu misses you amb un atac cos a cos, pots, com a reacció, force the attacker to reroll that attack against a creature (escull) that is also within 5 feet of the attacker. The ability fails and is wasted if the attacker is immune to being {@condition charmed}.
You can use this ability three times. En recuperes tots els usos of it quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Blackguard's Escape
entries: A nivell 15, you have the ability to slip away from your foes. Immediatament after you are hit by an attack, pots, com a reacció, turn {@condition invisible} and teleport fins a 60 peus to a spot que puguis veure. You remain {@condition invisible} fins el final del teu proper torn or until you attack, deal damage, or force a creature to make a saving throw. Un cop empris aquest tret no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Icon of Deceit
entries: A nivell 20, you gain the ability to emanate feelings of treachery. Com a acció, you can magically become an avatar of deceit, gaining the following benefits durant 1 minut:

items: You are {@condition invisible}.

Si una criatura damages you on its turn, ha de salvar per Saviesa (la CD és la teva CD de salvació de conjur) or you control its next action, provided that you aren't {@condition incapacitated} when it takes the action. A creature automatically succeeds on the save if the creature is immune to being {@condition charmed}.
If tens avantatge a an attack roll, you gain a bonus to its damage roll equal to el teu nivell de paladí.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Conquest v2
entries: The Oath of Conquest calls to paladins who seek glory in battle and the subjugation of their enemies. It isn't enough for these paladins to establish order. They must crush the forces of chaos. Sometimes called knight tyrants or iron mongers, those who swear this oath gather into grim orders that serve gods or philosophies of war and well-ordered might.

Some of these paladins go so far as to consort with the powers of the Nine Hells, valuing the rule of law over the balm of mercy. The archdevil Bel, warlord of Avernus, counts many of these paladins—called hell knights—as his most ardent supporters. Hell knights cover their armor with trophies taken from fallen enemies, a grim warning to any who dare oppose them and the decrees of their lords. These knights are often most fiercely resisted by other paladins of this oath, who believe that the hell knights have wandered too far into darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Conquering Presence
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to exude a terrifying presence. Com a acció, you force tota criatura que designis que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu to make a Saviesa saving throw. Si falla, a creature becomes {@condition frightened} de tu durant 1 minut. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat this saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

subclassFeature.name: Canalitzar Divinitat: Guided Strike
entries: Pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to strike with supernatural accuracy. When you make an attack roll, pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat to gain a +10 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs de prometença
entries: Aprèns conjurs de prometença als nivells de paladí llistats.

entries: A paladin who takes this oath has the tenets of conquest seared on the upper arm. A hell knight's oath appears in {@language diàstric} runes, a brutal reminder of vows to the Lords of Hell.
